answers.answer: It's called intermittent tachycardia. Mine would get into the 150s. My dr sent me to a cardiologist for an ekg and ultrasound on my heart just to make sure everything was ok. It was fine!

Okay thats good to know... Im just wondering if thst xould contribute to my dizzy spells and temporary vision changes. I already have blood work done to rule out preeclampsia plus my blood presuure had by been to high. But my heart rate hasn't been monitored at all this pregnancy.
I meant my blood presuure hasn't been to high just in the 130s

question: So I went to kroger today to take ny blood pressure. I've been feeling dizzy. But my bkood pressure was pretty normal. But my heart rate was so high and I was resting and not feeling any anxiety or panic.  So why is it so high?
title: 133 heart rate
